pros: There is no pros in this university. Too conservative
cons: Just don't go here. Working there for 5 yrs was a nightmare.

job_title: Ph D Candidate in Suwŏn, Kyonggi
pros: You will be working with a lot of smart people that can help you around with your research. They will help you if you can adapt to the culture and habit of korean people.
cons: The workload and mandatory work hour can be too much sometimes. my first 2 years I have to work from 9AM to 9PM everyday till Saturday. The pay is also very very small with the work you get. $600 scholarship for living is not enough to live in korea.
